pages.privacy-policy: PrimeTime Watches - Privacy Policy PrimeTime HOME ABOUT US Watches Contact PrimeTime Privacy Policy **Effective Date:** June 20, 2024 PrimeTime ("we," "us," or "our") respects the privacy of its users ("you" or "your"). This Privacy Policy describes the types of information we collect from and about you when you visit our website (the "Site") and how we use that information. Information We Collect We collect several types of information from and about users of our Site: **Personal Information:** This includes details that can be used to identify you directly, such as your name, email address, phone number, and mailing address. We only collect this information when you give it to us willingly, such as when you create an account, contact us, or sign up for our newsletter. **Non-Personal Information:** This includes information that cannot be used to identify you directly, like your device type, operating system, browser type, IP address, browsing activity on the Site, and demographic information. We collect this information automatically through cookies and other tracking tools. Cookies and Other Tracking Technologies We use cookies and other tracking tools to collect and store non-personal information. Cookies are small data files that are placed on your device when you visit a website. They allow the website to remember your actions and preferences over time. Your Choices You have control over your information: You can choose not to receive marketing messages from us by following the unsubscribe instructions in those messages. You can control cookies by adjusting the settings on your browser. Data Security We take reasonable steps to protect the information we collect from you from loss, misuse, and unauthorized access, disclosure, alteration, and destruction. However, no internet transmission or electronic storage method is 100% secure. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. We will post any changes on the Site. The PrimeTime website uses cookies to ensure you have the best experience on our site. Accept or Decline. Accept Decline PrimeTime Elevate Your style with Watches Home Disclaimers Privacy & Policy Terms & Conditions

pages.terms-conditions: PrimeTime Watches - Terms and Conditions PrimeTime HOME ABOUT US Watches Contact PrimeTime Terms and Conditions **Last Updated:** June 20, 2024 Please read these terms and conditions carefully before using the PrimeTime website (the "Site"). By accessing or using the Site, you agree to be bound by these terms and conditions ("Terms"). If you disagree with any part of the Terms, then you may not access or use the Site. Acceptance of Terms These Terms constitute a legally binding agreement between you ("User") and PrimeTime ("we," "us," or "our") regarding your access to and use of the Site. These Terms govern your rights and responsibilities in connection with the Site. Content Ownership The content displayed on the Site, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, images, and software, is the exclusive property of PrimeTime or its licensors and is protected by copyright, trademark, and other intellectual property laws. You may not modify, reproduce, distribute, create derivative works of, or publicly display any content from the Site without our express written permission. User Conduct You agree to use the Site in a lawful manner that complies with all applicable laws and regulations. You agree not to use the Site for any unauthorized or illegal purposes, such as infringing on the intellectual property rights of others or transmitting harmful content. Disclaimer of Warranties THE SITE IS PROVIDED "AS IS" AND "AS AVAILABLE" WITHOUT ANY WARRANTIES OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED. WE DISCLAIM ALL WARRANTIES, INCLUDING BUT NOT LIMITED TO, WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY, FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE, AND NON-INFRINGEMENT. WE DO NOT WARRANT THAT THE SITE WILL BE UNINTERRUPTED OR ERROR-FREE, THAT DEFECTS WILL BE CORRECTED, OR THAT THE SITE OR THE SERVER THAT MAKES IT AVAILABLE IS FREE OF VIRUSES OR OTHER HARMFUL COMPONENTS. Limitation of Liability IN NO EVENT SHALL WE BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, OR PUNITIVE DAMAGES ARISING OUT OF OR IN CONNECTION WITH YOUR USE OF THE SITE, EVEN IF WE HAVE BEEN ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES. Termination We may terminate your access to the Site at any time, for any reason, without notice. We may also, in our sole discretion, modify or discontinue the Site at any time without notice. Governing Law These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of the State of India without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Entire Agreement These Terms constitute the entire agreement between you and us regarding your use of the Site and supersede all prior or contemporaneous communications and proposals, whether oral or written.
